title: France panorama. [No. 68/01]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Swing-wing razzle dazzle - The “Mirage G”, variable geometry airplane unveiled at Istres. Polar expeditions - French Polar Expeditions 20th anniversary and Charcot’s birth 100th commemoration. 3. The Olympics: The Olympic torch lit in Greece. The Olympic torch in Paris.
